data.text: This week on MT Angle: recognizing the achievements of our tribal students and our heroic Montana National Guardsmen and their families. https://t.co/rTaZdubaI7

The members of the MT National Guard serve our state with courage & selflessness. Tonight I presented the MT National Guard Army Aviation Crew and the MT National Guard Family & Military Readiness Group with Congressional Records thanking them for their service. https://t.co/fdy0RQxQQB
.@POTUS is bringing prices down and making life more affordable for Americans. https://t.co/u1W9wFJWM0
It’s critical that we strengthen the relationship between the U.S & India, and this week’s trade deal is a great step in the right direction. https://t.co/JblKEKbsZk
We’re thankful for our brave MT National Guard- great to spend the evening with servicemembers & their families at Fort Harrison. https://t.co/go0MwIDhz2
In MT we have an all-of-the-above energy portfolio- from coal to hydropower, we’re preparing to meet the increase in energy demand. https://t.co/glsgQXqhPA

Proud to celebrate the inaugural Montana Mining Day today! Hard rock mining supports more than 18,000 jobs across our state and provides critical materials for national and economic security. https://t.co/qsUm0Gb7OC

The Working Families Tax Cut that @POTUS signed this past summer requires mandatory timber sales on  BLM & Forest Service land, which increases MT logging jobs & reduces wildfire risk. https://t.co/CPVPtOVYHX
Great to see @VP in Armenia. Strengthening our relationship with the region is critical for our national security. https://t.co/lIjgdgJ7NJ
There’s one thing the Iranian regime understands & that’s strength. Thankful for the strength of @POTUS & our great military. https://t.co/22jLmewarh
